string.value: #b#eTitle Challenge - Horned Tail Slayer#n(Special Title)\n#k#e#bHorned Tail Slayer#k#n, the title given to the person who slays the most Horned Tails! Dalair said that if I hunt a Horned Tail and don't report it to him, it won't count.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Horned Tail Slayer#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Horned Tail Hunting Record that Dalair knows about : #r#jmon##k 

After everyone reports to Dalair how many Horned Tails they hunted, the one who hunted the most will receive this title. But... wait? If I give up, I have to start all over when I try out again next time?!

#b#eTitle Challenge - Horned Tail Slayer#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Horned Tail Hunting Record that Dalair knows about : #r#jmon##k 

The honorable '#bHorned Tail Slayer#k' title is given to the one person who slays the most Horned Tails.
Only one person who hunts the most Horned Tails can be the owner of this title.
